title: Alternative to Typ1451
content:
Hey

Does anyone know of any alternatives to Typ1451 that are less expensive? (but equally nice!)

Thanks
author: tezzutezzu

comments.content:
Hi Danilo,

take your pick: [Soft rounded sans fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426052005/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontcase/genres/soft_rounded_sans/).  
 [More.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426052005/http:/typophile.com/node/35956) [Most.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426052005/http:/typophile.com/node/41317)  
F
